DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect D-fagomine glycaemic response sucrose men .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects D-Fagomine Glycaemic Response Sucrose Men
DOC.detailed_description: To determine compare glycaemic response sucrose D-Fagomine control timeframe 180 minute .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males age 20 70 willing able provide write informed consent . 1 . LDL cholesterol level higher 189 mg/dl 2 . Triglycerides high 350 mg/dl ( threshold level determine cLDL use Friedewald formula ) 3 . Physical examination routine biochemical analysis shall conduct rule pathology . 4 . Consumption supplement acetylsalicylic acid 5 . Chronic alcoholism 6 . Body mass index ( BMI ) great 30 kg/m2 7 . Previous antihypertensive treatment start trial finish least 2 month begin study 8 . Diabetes mellitus ( fast blood glucose high 126 mg/dl , test repeat confirm ) 9 . Kidney disease ( serum creatine level 1,4 mg/dl woman 1,5 mg/dl men ) 10 . Acute infectious disease , malignant tumor , severe liver failure , respiratory failure associate chronic endocrine diseases 11 . Other condition special dietary need 12 . To participate participated clinical trial within last 3 month 13 . Inability continue study 14 . History gastrointestinal disease may alter absorption nutrient 15 . Depressive disorder thought selfinjury
